name: Rogue
description: Rogues rely on cunning, stealth, and their foes' vulnerabilities to get the upper hand. They have a knack for finding solutions to any problem, making precise strikes over brute force. Some began as criminals, others as crime fighters.
weapon_proficiencies: Martial weapons with Finesse or Light property

1.Sneak Attack: Once per turn, deal extra 1d6 damage with Finesse/Ranged weapon if you have Advantage or ally within 5 feet of target.
1.Thieves' Cant: Know Thieves' Cant and one other language.
1.Weapon Mastery: Use mastery properties of two weapons.

2.Cunning Action: Take Dash, Disengage, or Hide as Bonus Action.

3.Steady Aim: As Bonus Action, give yourself Advantage on next attack (Speed 0 after).

4.Ability Score Improvement: Gain Ability Score Improvement feat or another feat.

5.Cunning Strike: Add effects to Sneak Attack by foregoing dice: Poison (1d6), Trip (1d6), Withdraw (1d6).
5.Uncanny Dodge: When hit by attack, use Reaction to halve damage.

6.Expertise: Gain Expertise in two more skills.

7.Evasion: Dexterity saves: no damage on success, half on fail.
7.Reliable Talent: Treat d20 rolls of 9 or lower as 10 for skill/tool proficiencies.

8.Ability Score Improvement: Gain Ability Score Improvement feat or another feat.

10.Ability Score Improvement: Gain Ability Score Improvement feat or another feat.

11.Improved Cunning Strike: Can use up to two Cunning Strike effects per Sneak Attack.

12.Ability Score Improvement: Gain Ability Score Improvement feat or another feat.

14.Devious Strikes: New Cunning Strikes: Daze (2d6), Knock Out (6d6), Obscure (3d6).

15.Slippery Mind: Gain proficiency in Wisdom and Charisma saves.

16.Ability Score Improvement: Gain Ability Score Improvement feat or another feat.

17.Subclass Feature: Gain capstone feature from your archetype.

18.Elusive: No attack roll can have Advantage against you unless you're Incapacitated.

19.Epic Boon: Gain Epic Boon feat. Boon of the Night Spirit recommended.

20.Stroke of Luck: If you fail d20 Test, turn the roll into a 20. Once per Short or Long Rest.
